Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Between meal breaks, I mostly spend every
minute looking forward to the next meal break.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
I want to eat until I can't take another bite...but if
I got too full, I'd get sleepy, wouldn't I? What
should I do?

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
I came here to shop, but there's nothing I
want... What should I do?

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
You're still working this late? You must be tired.
Our lady went to bed already.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Oh, we're almost out of firewood. I should go
get some more.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Our lady has a short temper... Please don't make
her angry.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Whenever someone makes our lady angry, she
always turns her rage on us...

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
I hope I can get through the day without another
verbal beating from our lady.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Our lady's such a nice person now, and we're all
so thankful for it!

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
What happened to our lady? She's a completely
different person now.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
I used to dread every day, and pray that she
wouldn't scold me again...
<PAGE>
But now I can live in peace, like it was all just a
bad dream.
